thread.section_title: SecureDataRecovery.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SecureDataRecovery.com | securedatarecovery.com
thread.title: Denis Blanco

author: Denis Blanco
title: Denis Blanco
text:
I have no complaint about the staff, everything was recovered 100%. The only thing that needs to be emphasized is the following: if a company opens a hard drive for a diagnostic test and you find a cheaper company, you could be charged an extra fee by the next company doing a diagnostic test.
After applying the 10 percent Yelp promotion to the case and another small discount for Educational purposes, our final price was $1488.26. This was priced for a 67 GB, a price we cannot refuse due to the fact of our external hard drive contained all the pictures of family whom has passed.
